review: received product promptly. When I went to install it knocked out cable service to that TV. Amazon service was not able to help neither was email I got from them. Then called Geek Squad, ABT service(where we bought it). Finally called AT&T; cable and after an hour with them got TV service back. The stick appeared to be interfering with TV & all settings on TV. Could not change HDMI input channel or volume down from max!  Returning device & will not try this again

review: Netflix app is pretty good, but the Twitch and Plex apps are horrible. Can't stream 1080P on Plex because it's too choppy with this device and Twitch app is virtually useless. Can't login or even search for a specific stream...essentially useless..

review: For Amazon movies and TV shows the stick works  great.  Running plex, Netflix, ESPN, or other channels there are times the media has to buffer or freeze  to catch up.
